(2,): As a user, I want to create a submission, so that I can submit my data for processing As a user, I want to validate my submission against rules, so that I can ensure my data is correct before submission As a user, I want to publish my submission if it is valid, so that my data can be processed
(0,): As a system, I want to load validation rules from the database, so that I can enforce current validation criteria As a data manager, I want to sync with FPDS data, so that I can ensure my files are up to date As a data processor, I want to process historical FABS data, so that I can include it in reports As a data quality analyst, I want to derive funding agency codes, so that records are properly categorized
(3,): As a data manager, I want to generate a D file, so that I can export submission data for external use As a data processor, I want to derive FREC codes, so that I can properly categorize agency data As a data quality analyst, I want to process deletions, so that outdated data is marked appropriately
(1,): As a UI tester, I want to schedule user testing, so that we can evaluate the system's usability As a UI tester, I want to record test issues, so that we can track and fix problems As a UI tester, I want to generate a test summary, so that we can analyze testing results As a system, I want to process a user submission end-to-end, so that all validation and publishing steps are completed
